overview: An introspective drama that follows the story of Sebastian, a young man who has recently emerged from a deep and prolonged depression. Struggling to find his bearings in a world that suddenly seems unfamiliar and daunting, Sebastian must navigate the uncertain waters of post-depression life, haunted by the fear that his illness could return at any moment.
tagline: If your soul were a body of water, what colors and reflections would you see in its stillness?
title: Still Waters
